title: Customer stories | monday.com
content: monday.com features numerous case studies and success stories showcasing how various organizations utilize their platform. These can be found directly on their website and through partner sites. On monday.com's official site, 'Customer stories' highlight how over 245,000 customers worldwide rely on their platform, detailing improvements in collaboration, streamlined workflows, and significant results. For instance, one customer noted that monday.com helped them operate like a small business with big-business complexity, while another stated it became a 'life-changer' for transparency and accountability across global projects. They also have a dedicated section for 'Nonprofits success stories,' explaining why the platform is preferred by nonprofits globally. Additionally, a page titled 'Watch: Customer stories' features video testimonials from brands like Nissan, Elal, and Zippo, illustrating how monday.com has transformed their operations. Zippo, for example, reported an 8x ROI and saved three business days a month by reducing reliance on spreadsheets and in-person meetings. The page also features filters to sort customer stories by team, region, industry, company size, and product, making it easy to find relevant examples. Third-party sites also compile monday.com case studies, including examples like Officeworks strengthening retail processes, Flight Centre saving 517 hours per month, and Wix solving growth challenges. These stories consistently demonstrate monday.com's effectiveness in driving operational efficiencies, cost reductions, and improved collaboration across diverse industries.
